titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: Address card for Dubois pasted onto bottom of card s2: <*> (May 18) = "guilt"? s3: <*> (Jan 13) = "Interpreters and Voices"? <*> (Jan 13) = "Oscet's"? <*> (Jan 22) = "Cathedrive"? s4: <*> (address) = "11th"? "IIIe"? <*> (3) = "Curteus"? <*> (7) = "Altar"? <*> (7) = "Soroing"?
